solution_line_template: Jess’ second stack was {first_stack_height} blocks + {second_stack_higher_than_first} blocks = <<{first_stack_height}+{second_stack_higher_than_first}={second_stack_height}>>{second_stack_height} blocks.

Jess’ third stack was {second_stack_height} blocks + {third_stack_higher_than_second} blocks = <<{second_stack_height}+{third_stack_higher_than_second}={third_stack_height}>>{third_stack_height} blocks high.

Jess’ sister knocked down the second tower and knocked {second_stack_height} blocks – {second_tower_left_standing} = <<{second_stack_height}-{second_tower_left_standing}={second_tower_knocked_over}>>{second_tower_knocked_over} blocks knocked over.

Jess’ sister knocked down the final tower and knocked {third_stack_height} blocks – {final_tower_left_standing} = <<{third_stack_height}-{final_tower_left_standing}={final_tower_knocked_over}>>{final_tower_knocked_over} blocks knocked over.

Total blocks knocked over was {first_tower_knocked_over} blocks + {second_tower_knocked_over} + {final_tower_knocked_over} = <<{first_tower_knocked_over}+{second_tower_knocked_over}+{final_tower_knocked_over}={total_blocks_knocked_over}>>{total_blocks_knocked_over} blocks.
